GSD.product_version: versions from v4.1 to before v5.18.15
GSD.description:
tcp: Fix a data-race around sysctl_tcp_probe_interval.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.15 by commit b14cc8afbbcbc6dce4797913c0b85266b897f541, it was introduced in version v4.1 by commit 05cbc0db03e82128f2e7e353d4194dd24a1627fe. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: tcp: Fix a data-race around sysctl_tcp_probe_interval.
OSV.details:
tcp: Fix a data-race around sysctl_tcp_probe_interval.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.15 by commit b14cc8afbbcbc6dce4797913c0b85266b897f541, it was introduced in version v4.1 by commit 05cbc0db03e82128f2e7e353d4194dd24a1627fe. For more details please see the references link.
